name: Rally Drift Car Chase
description:
Underground Rally is a drift based rally game and not a traffic racer. Drive with hill climb, asphalt drift, and real dirt drift. Rally with drift together. This category redefined with Underground Drift Racing. Rally Drift Underground Police Most Wanted Chase introduces best realistic and stunning controls for a rally game. Have fun with drifty and realistic tuned physics with detailed graphics, vehicles and racing tracks. Be a rally racer, drive as Ken Blocks, and Collin McRae on the tracks not in the traffic.

Fasten your seat belt and take the control of your extremely Powerful Car!
You have mastered acceleration, braking and steering!
Don't forget that the Drift is your friend! Be fast and be furious , its the only way to be victorious!
